aboutus.cardtext:
JJC SA USA is a branch of Jain Jagruti Center Central Board & Charitable Trust founded in order to connect with and help Jain Students/Alumni
residing in the United States. Mission,Vision and Core Values:
1. Include Every Jain Student no matter what Jain Pillar they belong.
2. Empower Students through Career Development and Mentorship Program.
3. Build a Search Engine for Engagement and Connections between Students and Alumnis
4. Leverage Digital Media Services to share knowledge about Jain Commu
